CustomField.formula: IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Plan_Status__c, 'Submitted for Approval'), OR(Sales_Manager__c = $User.Id,Manager__c= $User.Id,AP_Lite_Manager__c = $User.Id) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/AccountPlanUpdateStatus?Id=" & Id, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015A0000002iugy", 'Approve'), '_parent') & ' ' & HYPERLINK("/apex/AccountPlanRejection?Id=" & Id, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015A0000002iugz", 'Reject'), '_parent'), IF( ISPICKVAL(Plan_Status__c , 'Pending'), HYPERLINK("/apex/AccountPlanUpdateStatus?Id=" & Id, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015A0000001dB7J", 'Submit for Approval'), '_parent'), IF( ISPICKVAL(Plan_Status__c , 'Rejected'), HYPERLINK("/apex/AccountPlanUpdateStatus?Id=" & Id, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015A0000002iuh0", 'Resubmit for Approval'), '_parent'), '[No Approval Option Available]' ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Status = Pending, a Submit for Approval button will appear only for the Account Executive of the Account Plan. When Status = Submitted for Approval, a Review and Approve button will appear only for the Sales Manager/RSM of the Account Plan
CustomField.label: Next Actions
